Darkfate::

"Let me ask you" said the bot "who's the faction that
we have to fight?"
--- kinger01030@... wrote:
>  Galvatron sent a comm top darkefate. "Darkefate. I
> await your signal. When 
> you reach 3/4 the way here I will make my
> distraction that will allow the 
> maximals and alliance to flank them on the right and
> you come from the left 
> surronding them. The destrons will support the back
> so they have no escape."
>
